name: Teeny Tanks
description:
Teeny tanks puts you in control of a miniature tank in an ever changing arena of blocks. Your mission is to take out the other five tanks.

Keys: wads or arrow keys to move

             Space to fire.

             Esc to quit.

An endless arena awaits you. Procedurally generated map and ever changing level of blocks and enemies. Many powerups and debuffs spawn in the game. Survive endless amounts of enemies and aim for a high score.
